    Exceptions¶

    Exception hierarchy for claude-agent-graph.

    Exceptions for claude-agent-graph package.

    Defines all custom exceptions used throughout the package.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.AgentGraphError[source]¶

    Bases: Exception

    Base exception for AgentGraph errors.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.NodeNotFoundError[source]¶

    Bases: AgentGraphError

    Raised when a node is not found in the graph.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.EdgeNotFoundError[source]¶

    Bases: AgentGraphError

    Raised when an edge is not found in the graph.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.DuplicateNodeError[source]¶

    Bases: AgentGraphError

    Raised when attempting to add a node with an existing ID.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.DuplicateEdgeError[source]¶

    Bases: AgentGraphError

    Raised when attempting to add a duplicate edge.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.TopologyViolationError[source]¶

    Bases: AgentGraphError

    Raised when a graph operation violates topology constraints.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.AgentSessionError[source]¶

    Bases: AgentGraphError

    Raised when agent session operations fail.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.CommandAuthorizationError[source]¶

    Bases: AgentGraphError

    Raised when command execution is unauthorized.

    Base Exception¶

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.AgentGraphError[source]¶

    Base exception for AgentGraph errors.

    Node Exceptions¶

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.NodeNotFoundError[source]¶

    Raised when a node is not found in the graph.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.DuplicateNodeError[source]¶

    Raised when attempting to add a node with an existing ID.

    Edge Exceptions¶

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.EdgeNotFoundError[source]¶

    Raised when an edge is not found in the graph.

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.DuplicateEdgeError[source]¶

    Raised when attempting to add a duplicate edge.

    Topology Exceptions¶

    Agent Exceptions¶

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.AgentSessionError[source]¶

    Raised when agent session operations fail.

    Command Exceptions¶

    exception claude_agent_graph.exceptions.CommandAuthorizationError[source]¶

    Raised when command execution is unauthorized.
